title: Exercises for Improving Willpower and Concentration: Meditate on the symbol of Ares-Ferro-Marte.
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author explains two physical exercises (lying down with legs up and rotating legs while lying down) that help to develop abdominal muscles, focus on the center of gravity and build willpower. These exercises complement the meditation on the symbol of Ares, Ferro, and Marte, which represent the idea of willpower and its applications. This symbol emphasizes the importance of cultivating volition and balancing active and passive energies within oneself, as well as directing them towards specific goals. The author also suggests practicing vivification, the process of gaining control over one's desires and impulses.

last_phrase: In summary, performing the abdominal exercise with feet close to the ground requires strong willpower and concentration. Meditating on the Ares-Ferro-Marte symbol can aid in cultivating the will and magnetic energy within oneself. Practicing self-control towards desires and obstacles can help direct the energy upwards. Embracing this symbol and practicing self-control can cultivate the willpower needed to achieve one's goals.
